statements: SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_number IN (101, 202, 303);
SELECT AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 5000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_accounts, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT AVG(balance) AS average_balance, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY balance DESC, account_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_number, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 5000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT account_number, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM customer_accounts GROUP BY account_number;

SELECT th.transaction_id, ca.account_number, th.transaction_type, th.amount, th.transaction_date FROM transaction_history th INNER JOIN customer_accounts ca ON th.account_number = ca.account_number WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY th.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM customer_accounts GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT account_number, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_number, log_message, log_date FROM account_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_number = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_number, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' GROUP BY account_number;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance, transaction_type, amount FROM customer_accounts JOIN transactions ON customer_accounts.account_number = transactions.account_number WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM account_holders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type IN ('deposit', 'transfer') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE account_number IN (1001, 1003, 1005);
SELECT customer_name, email FROM account_holders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT account_number, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT account_number, password FROM login_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT holder_name, contact_number FROM AccountHolders WHERE holder_id = 12345;
SELECT branch_name, branch_address FROM Branches WHERE branch_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAccounts;
SELECT account_id, account_number, balance FROM CustomerAccounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT holder_name, contact_number, account_number FROM CustomerAccounts JOIN AccountHolders ON CustomerAccounts.account_id = AccountHolders.account_id;
SELECT branch_name, branch_address FROM Branches WHERE branch_name = 'Main Branch';
SELECT account_type_name, minimum_balance FROM AccountTypes ORDER BY minimum_balance DESC;
